task.title: How to reply to an email
task.shortdesc: Here you will learn how to reply to an email.

prereq.p: You need to have received an email from someone.

context.p: You will learn how to reply to:
single email, forward an email within a thread, forward an entire conversation.

step.cmd: To reply to a single email or the last email in a thread, click Reply.
To reply to an email within a thread, click Reply.
To forward a single email or the last email in a thread, click Forward.
To forward an email within a thread, click More and then Forward.
To see previous email in a thread, click Show trimmed content.
To forward an entire conversation, at the top, click More eand then Forward all.
To use a Smart Reply, at the bottom of the email, click a suggested reply. You can then edit the email before sending it.

example.p: You can reply to emails send from your friends or colleagues.
